CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.monitoring_id_by_relation_id(relation_list character varying) RETURNS TABLE(id bigint, entity_id bigint, parent_id bigint, is_archive boolean) LANGUAGE sql PARALLEL SAFE AS $function$ SELECT id, entity_id_2, entity_id_1 as parent_id, is_archive FROM public.monitoring_object_relation m WHERE id = any(string_to_array( relation_list, ',')::int8[] ) ;
$function$ ;
